XmlSaxContext Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

GisXmlSaxContext provides contextual information to the GisSaxHandler callback implementations when an XML document parse is in progress. This class provides very rudimentary functionality such as error reporting and access to the GisXmlReader doing the parse. Applications can pass extra information by sub-classing from this class.


Public Member Functions

__property NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlReader * get_Reader ()
 Gets the GisXmlReader that is parsing the XML document.
